reviews.review: Thanos is a great villain with a complex story and the characters as well as their interactions are perfect, the pacing may have some problems, but throughtout the film you'll get many emotions
I was afraid that this movie was not going to live up to the hype, and I can say with full confidence that it most certainty did live up to the hype and had an ending that left me speechless.

Not standard film fare that every audience will want, but I can't imagine that fans, and those that have enjoyed the Marvel slate to this point to be disappointed by a night out with this film. I found the narrative, pacing, and focus of the film incredibe, as well as pristinely executed and refreshing. Thanos rules.
Very much enjoyed watching this movie.  Fun to watch them put the band together - they played well.

The acquisition of Fox Studios must have infected Disney with the bad Marvel movie gene.  Despite wanting to like this movie, it ended up being nothing but a 2.5 hour fight scene with no substance.  Extremely disappointing

Many critics will most likely not acknowledge that for the fans that have kept up with all the movies, and some fans that even saw some movies, this is Empire Strikes Back levels. Thanos is Darth Vader level. Most critics will assume this is a one-time movie, with no background, thus will not understand the emotion and plot.... 

For the real Marvel fans, the first ten minutes are better than every movie besides maybe Winter Soldier and Black Panther. This is no doubt a ground-breaking, and revolutionary movie that will never be topped for years to come. It is truly a MASTERPIECE.
RIP Spidey and Black Panther you were always my favorites.

Did a great job of incorporating all of the heroes and ended on an epic cliff hanger which is pissing me off.
walking out of the theater post-credits felt like a funeral procession. nothing but silence. then I remembered the marvel creed: heroes can die but they'll eventually come back.
